pr_title: docs(#8425): Adds Documentation for Vault TOTP secret engine

timeline.bodyText: And replace Vault with a Vault TOTP link as well
timeline.author: sberyozkin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -492,6 +492,45 @@ You should see:
 {password=connor}
 ----
 
+[[totp]]
+== TOTP Secrets Engine
+
+The TOTP secrets engine generates time-based credentials according to the TOTP standard.
+
+Vault supports both the generator scenario (like Google Authenticator) and the provider scenario (like the Google.com sign in).

timeline.bodyText: also can be dropped: The Vault extension integrates with the http://...[Vault TOTP] secret engine by providing...
timeline.author: sberyozkin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -492,6 +492,45 @@ You should see:
 {password=connor}
 ----
 
+[[totp]]
+== TOTP Secrets Engine
+
+The TOTP secrets engine generates time-based credentials according to the TOTP standard.
+
+Vault supports both the generator scenario (like Google Authenticator) and the provider scenario (like the Google.com sign in).
+You can read more about Vault TOTP at https://www.vaultproject.io/docs/secrets/totp/.
+
+The Vault extension also supports TOTP by integrating with TOTP secret engine by providing an `io.quarkus.vault.VaultTOTPSecretEngine` class.

timeline.bodyText: Hmm, I've lost a comment, proposal was to replace The TOTP secrets engine with a link, https://www.vaultproject.io/docs/secrets/totp/[VaultTOTP] and drop "You can read more about..."
